vulnerability_findings.name: use-abi-encodecall-instead-of-encodewithselector

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in LibAuthorizableRichErrors.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (LibAuthorizableRichErrors.sol#21): it allows old versions
